docs.snippet: The Jets’ top draft pick, Dee Milliner, who was pulled from Thursday’s game in New England for poor play, received similar treatment as an Alabama freshman before becoming a standout....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Jets’ top draft pick, Dee Milliner, who was pulled from Thursday’s game in New England for poor play, received similar treatment as an Alabama freshman before becoming a standout.
docs.abstract: New York Jets coach Rex Ryan remains noncommittal on whether rookie cornerback Dee Milliner, who was benched in game against New England Patriots because of poor play, will regain his starting role for upcoming game against Buffalo Bills.

headline.main: Jets Rookie Cornerback Learned All About the Bench in College
